titleStmt.title: By the Governour & Council Whereas some have lately presumed to print and disperse a pamphlet entituled, Publick occurrences, both foreign and domestick: Boston, Thursday, Septemb. 25th. 1690. Without the least priviry or countenance of authority ...
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Governor (1689-1692 : Bradstreet)
Bradstreet, Simon, 1603-1697.
Massachusetts. Council.

notesStmt.note: Signed: "By order of the governour & council. Isaac Addington, Secr."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
